tagline: jQuery plugin to scroll a div within a div
name: Multiscroll
body:
# MultiScroll jQuery Plugin

Scroll a div by hovering, dragging, clicking, or mousewheel.

Dependencies: none (but the jQuery mousewheel plugin is bundled)

How to add to a Rails asset pipeline: `gem 'multiscroll', :git => 'git://github.com/bronson/multiscroll.git'`

## Acknowledgements

- http://rascarlito.free.fr/hoverscroll/
- http://www.smoothdivscroll.com/index.html

License: Pain-Free MIT (same as jQuery)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
